name: MithulBlox Shots: Color Shift
description:
Enjoy the color of breakout clone in a Neon World with a little bit of twist!

Features Inside:

  • Shake Animation
  • Stats to keep your personal score
  • Gamepad Support
  • Gamepad Vibration

And many more....

Controls:

Keyboard:

Left/Right to move the paddle.

S/X key to cycle the color of the paddle.

Space to release the ball.

Esc to pause the game.

Gamepad/Controller:

Left analog stick to move the paddle.

X/B button to cycle the color of the paddle.

A to release the ball.

Start to pause the game.
